name: Yandere AI Girlfriend Simulator ~ With You Til The End 世界尽头与可爱猫娘 ~ 病娇AI女友 Powered by ChatGPT
name_original: Yandere AI Girlfriend Simulator ~ With You Til The End 世界尽头与可爱猫娘 ~ 病娇AI女友 Powered by ChatGPT
description:
Escape Room game with a Yandere AI girlfriend, who is integrated using ChatGPT. High intelligent AI NPC, you can discuss any topics you want with her, and find a way to escape her room! First of its kind immersive interaction >>> REQUIREMENT

>>> OPENAI API <<< IS REQUIRED TO PLAY THIS GAME!

Azure Speech Service API is optional if you want to hear the voice output from the Yandere AI girlfriend for optimal experience.

YOUR KEYS WILL NOT BE SHARED! You could clear your keys after playing from the links above.

Read the instructions below for more details.

Sorry for any inconvenience of setting up our game. This version is for experimental purposes.

OBJECTIVE

Embark on an unforgettable escape room adventure where you'll have to use all your wit and charm to convince the Yandere cat girl to unlock the door, or by uncovering hidden clues and solving puzzles.

How will you escape?

FEATURE
  • Immerse yourself in a truly unique gaming experience with absolutely no set script to follow
  • Negotiate with the complex and unpredictable Yandere cat girl, whose personality and moods will change from round to round
  • Your choices and conversations with the Yandere cat girl will have a significant impact on the game's outcome, so be strategic and think on your feet
INSTRUCTION

Press Enter  - Start typing reply, press Enter again to send message

Hold V - Turn on mic input, release V key to send message

Press E - Interact with items

Hold Tab - Collection menu

ESC - Open / close pause menu

- HOW TO SET/CLEAR THE KEYS
